text: Adil Ahmad Khan (born July 7, 1988) is an Indian professional athlete. He is best known as an Association football or soccer player.Soccerway.com, A. Khan. Retrieved 2012-7-7. He has played for the Indian national team.NationalFootballTeams.com, Khan, Adil. Retrieved 2012-7-11. ==Career== Khan has been a part of the Sporting Clube de Goa since 2007. ==International== Khan played for India against Azerbaijan in 2012.Goal.com, "Azerbaijan vs India LIVE Commentary," February 27, 2012.
